tweet: Hi, I've created this Twitter account to keep fans of Japanese golf and players like Katayama, Ishikawa and Ikeda in the loop!
Not much coverage of the JGTO (Japan Golf Tour) outside of Japan, so hopefully fans from the UK, USA and the World and keep up to date here!
Golf Japan: our new blog; http://golfjapan.wordpress.com/ - the most comprehensive round by round Japan Golf Tour reports and news!!
Japan Golf Tour Nagashima Shiego Sega Sammy - Play suspended due to fog, Takayama leads so far, full report here: http://bit.ly/aHZjWU
Ryo Ishikawa has rough day on return to Japan in the Nagashima Shiego Invitational Sega Sammy Cup; http://bit.ly/aHZjWU
